official_title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act, 1916, to provide for the licensing, bonding and regulating of nonvessel operating common carriers in the foreign and domestic offshore commerce of the United States.

summary.text: Provides for the licensing, bonding, and regulating of nonvessel operating common carriers in the foreign and domestic offshore commerce of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act, 1916, to provide for the licensing, bonding and regulating of nonvessel operating common carriers in the foreign and domestic offshore commerce of the United States.
